text: The Kidnapping of the President is a 1980 Canadian American thriller movie directed by George Mendeluk and based on the 1977 novel of the same name by Charles Templeton. It stars William Shatner, Hal Holbrook, Ava Gardner, Sully Boyar, Maury Chaykin, Aubert Pallascio. ==Other websites== * Category:1980 thriller movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Canadian thriller movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies about abduction Category:Movies set in Toronto
title: The Kidnapping of the President
